title: Miranda
subtitle: Series 1: 1. Date
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. Settle in for every episode, ever. Such fun!

synopses.small: Miranda gets overexcited by the prospect of her first real date.
synopses.editorial: Miranda Hart's prat-falling, cockle-warming sitcom - from start to finish.

synopses.small: Granville is forced into taking extra security precautions for the shop's takings.
synopses.editorial: Granville flips over the sign to Arkwrightâ€™s - Britain's daftest corner shop.

synopses.small: At an engagement party, a bedroom with old baggage in it has been left unlocked...
synopses.editorial: Surprising, creepy and hilarious storytelling from Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmith.

title: There She Goes
subtitle: Series 1: 1. One Day in the Life of Rosie Yates
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. A unique daughter and a loving, complex family

synopses.small: It's a typical Saturday for nine-year-old Rosie, who has a severe learning disability.
synopses.editorial: Life with learning disabilties. With a BAFTA-winning performance by Jessica Hynes.

title: This Country
subtitle: Series 1: 1. Scarecrow
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. A BAFTA-winning look at life in rural Britain

synopses.small: The team visit a scarecrow festival, an event that both unites and divides the community.
synopses.editorial: It's their village, and you'd better not forget it. Cotswolds life at its finest.

title: Mortimer & Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
subtitle: Series 1: Episode 1
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. Life, death and fish

synopses.small: Paul and Bob fish for tench in Norfolk and reminisce about their childhood days.
synopses.editorial: Comedy pals Paul and Bob travel the UK to catch fish and talk a lot of nonsense.
